scripts.serve: powershell -Command "Start-Process powershell -ArgumentList '-NoExit','-Command','npm run start:node'; Start-Process powershell -ArgumentList '-NoExit','-Command','npm run start:admin'"; Start-Process powershell -ArgumentList '-NoExit','-Command','npm run start:uniapp' ; Start-Process powershell -ArgumentList '-NoExit','-Command','npm run start:uniapp:h5'
